name: Card Clash! (Demo)
description:
Take charge in this heated card battle RPG game! Fight through waves of enemy hands. Use the Attack triangle to determine which cards can attack. Knight beats Wizard, Wizard beats Zombie and Zombie beats Knight. Use this to defeat the enemy at all costs. Make the Enemy Health reach 0% to win. Enjoy the cute art.

Let me know in the comments if you beat the game, and how many turns it took!
